questions.question: Five volts is applied to two 2 ohm resistors in series. The resulting current is

explanations.a: Too high; would require only 1Ω of total resistance.
explanations.b: Too low; total resistance is 4Ω, so I = 5/4.
explanations.c: Too high; recheck resistance and Ohm’s law.

questions.question: Five volts is applied to two 2 ohm resistors connected in parallel. The resulting current is

explanations.b: Incorrect; this is for series configuration.
